Buck File
  PsiComment(BuckTokenType.LINE_COMMENT)('# Line comments in a nested suite')
  BuckStatementImpl(STATEMENT)
    BuckCompoundStatementImpl(COMPOUND_STATEMENT)
      BuckFunctionDefinitionImpl(FUNCTION_DEFINITION)
        PsiElement(BuckTokenType.def)('def')
        PsiElement(BuckTokenType.IDENTIFIER)('foo')
        PsiElement(BuckTokenType.()('(')
        BuckParameterListImpl(PARAMETER_LIST)
          BuckParameterImpl(PARAMETER)
            PsiElement(BuckTokenType.IDENTIFIER)('x')
        PsiElement(BuckTokenType.))(')')
        PsiElement(BuckTokenType.:)(':')
        BuckSuiteImpl(SUITE)
          PsiElement(BuckTokenType.INDENT)('    ')
          PsiComment(BuckTokenType.LINE_COMMENT)('# comment in block should set indentation level')
          BuckStatementImpl(STATEMENT)
            BuckSimpleStatementImpl(SIMPLE_STATEMENT)
              BuckSmallStatementImpl(SMALL_STATEMENT)
                BuckExpressionStatementImpl(EXPRESSION_STATEMENT)
                  BuckExpressionListImpl(EXPRESSION_LIST)
                    BuckExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
                      BuckSimpleExpressionImpl(SIMPLE_EXPRESSION)
                        BuckPrimaryWithSuffixImpl(PRIMARY_WITH_SUFFIX)
                          BuckPrimaryImpl(PRIMARY)
                            PsiElement(BuckTokenType.IDENTIFIER)('    y')
                  PsiElement(BuckTokenType.=)('=')
                  BuckExpressionListImpl(EXPRESSION_LIST)
                    BuckExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
                      BuckSimpleExpressionImpl(SIMPLE_EXPRESSION)
                        BuckPrimaryWithSuffixImpl(PRIMARY_WITH_SUFFIX)
                          BuckPrimaryImpl(PRIMARY)
                            BuckListImpl(LIST)
                              PsiElement(BuckTokenType.[)('[')
                              BuckSimpleExpressionListImpl(SIMPLE_EXPRESSION_LIST)
                                BuckSimpleExpressionImpl(SIMPLE_EXPRESSION)
                                  BuckPrimaryWithSuffixImpl(PRIMARY_WITH_SUFFIX)
                                    BuckPrimaryImpl(PRIMARY)
                                      PsiElement(BuckTokenType.IDENTIFIER)('x')
                                PsiElement(BuckTokenType.,)(',')
                              PsiComment(BuckTokenType.LINE_COMMENT)('# indentation')
                              PsiComment(BuckTokenType.LINE_COMMENT)('# doesn't')
                              PsiComment(BuckTokenType.LINE_COMMENT)('# matter')
                              PsiComment(BuckTokenType.LINE_COMMENT)('# inside')
                              PsiComment(BuckTokenType.LINE_COMMENT)('# parens or braces')
                              PsiElement(BuckTokenType.])(']')
          PsiComment(BuckTokenType.LINE_COMMENT)('# or here')
          PsiComment(BuckTokenType.LINE_COMMENT)('    # outside parens/braces, comment indentation matters again')
  PsiComment(BuckTokenType.LINE_COMMENT)('# This less-indented comment should be at same level as next statement')
  BuckStatementImpl(STATEMENT)
    BuckSimpleStatementImpl(SIMPLE_STATEMENT)
      BuckSmallStatementImpl(SMALL_STATEMENT)
        BuckExpressionStatementImpl(EXPRESSION_STATEMENT)
          BuckExpressionListImpl(EXPRESSION_LIST)
            BuckExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
              BuckSimpleExpressionImpl(SIMPLE_EXPRESSION)
                BuckPrimaryWithSuffixImpl(PRIMARY_WITH_SUFFIX)
                  BuckPrimaryImpl(PRIMARY)
                    PsiElement(BuckTokenType.IDENTIFIER)('bar')
          PsiElement(BuckTokenType.=)('=')
          BuckExpressionListImpl(EXPRESSION_LIST)
            BuckExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
              BuckSimpleExpressionImpl(SIMPLE_EXPRESSION)
                BuckPrimaryWithSuffixImpl(PRIMARY_WITH_SUFFIX)
                  BuckPrimaryImpl(PRIMARY)
                    PsiElement(BuckTokenType.IDENTIFIER)('foo')
